title: Blow-Up
headline_credit: Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1966
brief_description: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music and sex is bored by his life. In the course of a single day, he accidentally captures on film the commission of a murder.

constellations_other.name: Papa-paparazzi
constellations_other.description: Media attention and paparazzi from the assassination of JFK to Lady Gaga's music video.

headline_credit_for_label: Italy, United Kingdom and United States of America, 1966
description: A successful mod photographer in London whose world is bounded by fashion, pop music, marijuana, and easy sex, feels his life is boring and despairing. But in the course of a single day he accidentally captures on film the commission of a murder. The fact that he has photographed a murder does not occur to him until he studies and then blows up his negatives, uncovering details, blowing up smaller and smaller elements, and finally putting the puzzle together.
